title: Well-regulated Structures Featured Giant-molecule Acceptors Enable Long-term Stability and High-Performance Binary Organic Solar Cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03754E, Paper
Jingyu Shi, Pengfei Ding, Jintao Zhu, Zhenyu Chen, Shuangjiao Gao, Xueliang Yu, Xiaochun Liao, Quan Liu, Ziyi Ge
The well-defined structures featured giant-molecule acceptors (GMAs) can exhibit unique properties of small-molecule acceptors and polymers simultaneously, and the consecutive innovations in materials design have enabled GMAs-based organic solar cells...
